author: Abigail Roberts
title: Crowdsourcing desperately needed medical supplies in coronavirus fight
description: How grassroots efforts are providing medical personnel with much-needed PPE.
content: Just a little over a week ago, Mericien Venzon was a typical fourth-year medical student at New York University. Dan Lurie was a cognitive neuroscience graduate student at the University of California, Berkeley. Louise Siu and Sonia Hsia were both stay-at-hom… [+4001 chars]
